title: My Profile
subtitle: View and manage your account information

wallet.title: BEP-20 Wallet
wallet.description: Your verified wallet address for receiving rewards
wallet.notSetDescription: Please add your BEP-20 wallet address on the Wallet page

socialMedia.title: Social Media Accounts
socialMedia.description: Connect your social media accounts to complete tasks
socialMedia.permanentNote: This username is permanently linked to your account
socialMedia.usernameHelp: Enter your username without the @ symbol

twitter.title: Twitter
twitter.description: Link your X (Twitter) account to verify your identity
twitter.verifiedDescription: Your X (Twitter) account is verified and linked

telegram.title: Telegram
telegram.description: Link your Telegram account to verify your identity
telegram.verifiedDescription: Your Telegram account is verified and linked

warning.title: Important: Read Before Adding
warning.permanent: Your username will be permanently locked after confirmation
warning.cannotChange: You cannot change your username once verified

info.title: Username Requirements
info.characters: Can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores

errors.tooShort: Username must be at least 3 characters
errors.invalidFormat: Username can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
errors.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

confirmation.title: Confirm Username
confirmation.subtitle: This action cannot be undone

critical.title: CRITICAL: Please Read Carefully
critical.permanent: This username will be PERMANENTLY locked to your account
critical.cannotChange: You CANNOT change or update this username after confirmation
critical.verify: Verify the username is correct before confirming

confirmation.acknowledgement: By confirming, you acknowledge that you have read and understood all warnings above

taskCompletions.title: Task Completion Notifications
taskCompletions.description: Receive emails when you complete tasks and earn points

walletVerifications.title: Wallet Verification Updates
walletVerifications.description: Get notified about your wallet verification status changes

adminNotifications.title: Important Account Updates
adminNotifications.description: Receive critical notifications about your account

marketingEmails.title: Marketing & Promotions
marketingEmails.description: Get updates about new features, campaigns, and special offers

note.title: Note:
note.description: Critical security and account-related emails will always be sent regardless of your preferences.
